name: SpaceOff
description:
Ever play Asteroids? Ever wish it was PvP? Ever wish it had walls that didn't kill you and that there were no asteroids!? EVER WI-- yeah okay. Well this is that game, for all three of you out there.

Both players start with 5 hp. Each shot deals 1 dmg. Shoot yourself to heal 1 hp. Keep track of it all in your head. For fun. Yup.

Best played on a keyboard with n-key rollover support (aka most ps/2 keyboards and some of the fancier usb ones).

P1 Controls:

  • A, W, D to move around
  • S to fire

P2 Controls:

  • left, up, right arrows to move around
  • down arrow to fire
